shortDescription.default: A Toy List in Fluent UI web part built with SPFx 1.12

longDescription.default: This Toy Lit web part demonstrates the integration of Fluent UI components within a SharePoint Framework (SPFx) web part using version 1.12 of SPFx.

features.title: toy-list Feature
features.description: The feature that activates elements of the spfx-122-fluentui-webpart solution.
